item.description:
This film was recommended by a member of the meetup (who hopefully will show up). The trailer is quite funny. The website is www.66thefilm.com

England, the summer of '66, and the country is about to be consumed by World Cup Fever. But 12-year-old Bernie is more concerned about his looming Bar Mitzvah. When the World Cup final is scheduled for Bernie's big day, he fears his meticulous plans will unravel.

We could go out for dinner or drinks afterwards. There are some very nice restaurants around Real Art Ways.
item.how_to_find_us: I still look like my picture.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: Sixty-Six
